Interface FURNITUREInterface

public interface FURNITUREInterface
This interface provides a blueprint for basic operations on furniture, purchasers, and furniture categories within a furniture management system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCategory(FurnitureCategory category)
    Adds a new category for furniture in the system.
    void
    addFurniture(FurnitureBase furniture)
    Adds a new piece of furniture to the system.
    void
    addPurchaser(Purchaser purchaser)
    Adds a new purchaser to the system.
    FurnitureCategory
    getCategoryByID(String id)
    Retrieves a furniture category by its unique ID.
    FurnitureBase
    getFurnitureByID(String id)
    Retrieves a piece of furniture by its unique ID.
    Purchaser
    getPurchaserByID(String id)
    Retrieves a purchaser by its unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • addFurniture

      void addFurniture(FurnitureBase furniture)
      Adds a new piece of furniture to the system.
      Parameters:
      furniture - The FurnitureBase object to be added.

    • addPurchaser

      void addPurchaser(Purchaser purchaser)
      Adds a new purchaser to the system.
      Parameters:
      purchaser - The Purchaser object to be added.

    • addCategory

      void addCategory(FurnitureCategory category)
      Adds a new category for furniture in the system.
      Parameters:
      category - The FurnitureCategory object to be added.

    • getFurnitureByID

      FurnitureBase getFurnitureByID(String id)
      Retrieves a piece of furniture by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the desired furniture.
      Returns:
      FurnitureBase object with the matching ID or null if not found.

    • getPurchaserByID

      Purchaser getPurchaserByID(String id)
      Retrieves a purchaser by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the desired purchaser.
      Returns:
      Purchaser object with the matching ID or null if not found.

    • getCategoryByID

      FurnitureCategory getCategoryByID(String id)
      Retrieves a furniture category by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the desired furniture category.
      Returns:
      FurnitureCategory object with the matching ID or null if not found.
